H0.text: How many times was Boris Becker runner-up in the Men's Singles at Wimbledon. 1

H1.text: How many times was Boris Becker runner-up in the Men's Singles at Wimbledon. 2

H2.text: How many times was Boris Becker runner-up in the Men's Singles at Wimbledon. 3

H3.text: How many times was Boris Becker runner-up in the Men's Singles at Wimbledon. 4

A4.text: Becker contested the Wimbledon final in 1988, where he lost in four sets to Stefan Edberg.

A5.text: In 1990, Becker met Edberg for the third consecutive year in the Wimbledon final, but this time lost in a five-set match.
